mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (member_id, place_id, title, content, picture, rate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{placeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{picture}, #{rate})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, place_id as placeId, title, content, picture, rate, like_cnt as likeCnt, created_date as createDate, last_modified_date as lastModifiedDate FROM review WHERE place_id = #{placeId} ORDER BY like_cnt DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_subscribe WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND review_id = #{reviewId}
